title: v1.6.0.10 UI Improvements
content:
UI LAYOUT AND USABILITY FIXES

CHANGES IMPLEMENTED:
1. Button Alignment: Changed from 'center' to 'baseline' in .group-header
   - Aligns buttons with title text baseline instead of geometric center
   - Better visual hierarchy

2. Spacing Adjustments:
   - Increased gap between count and buttons from 16px to 41px (+25px)
   - Reduced category label padding from 6px to 1px (-10px vertical)
   - More breathing room, less cramped appearance

3. Button Labels: Replaced emoji with text (12 buttons total)
   - Changed ↑ to "Select All"
   - Changed ↓ to "Deselect All"
   - Better accessibility and clarity

4. Triangle Rotation: Added !important to CSS selector
   - Ensures triangle rotates 90° when group expands (▶ → ▼)
   - Prevents specificity conflicts

FILE: popup.html
AFFECTED SECTIONS: Live Console Filters (3 groups) + Export Log Filters (3 groups)
TOTAL BUTTONS UPDATED: 12

RESULT: More professional appearance, clearer functionality, better UX
